SELECT u.id, u.name, u.birth_year as birthY, u.birth_month as birthM , u.birth_day as birthD, u.sex, u.memo, u.sex_value FROM ( SELECT u1.id, u1.name, u1.birth_year, u1.birth_month, u1.birth_day , u1.sex, u1.memo, m.sex_value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY u1.id) AS rn FROM USER_DATA u1, M_SEX m WHERE u1.sex = m.sex_cd
AND u1.name like '%' || #{searchForm.searchName} || '%'
AND #{searchForm.fromBirthYear} || lpad(#{searchForm.fromBirthMonth}, 2, '0') || lpad(#{searchForm.fromBirthDay}, 2, '0') <= u1.birth_year || lpad(u1.birth_month, 2, '0') || lpad(u1.birth_day, 2, '0')
AND u1.birth_year || lpad(u1.birth_month, 2, '0') || lpad(u1.birth_day, 2, '0') <= #{searchForm.toBirthYear} || lpad(#{searchForm.toBirthMonth}, 2, '0') || lpad(#{searchForm.toBirthDay}, 2, '0')
AND u1.sex = #{searchForm.searchSex}
ORDER BY u1.id ) u
u.rn between #{pageable.offset} and (#{pageable.offset} + #{pageable.pageSize} - 1)
SELECT id, name, birth_year as birthY, birth_month as birthM , birth_day as birthD, sex, memo FROM USER_DATA WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_DATA ( id, name, birth_year, birth_month , birth_day, sex, memo ) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{birthY}, #{birthM} , #{birthD}, #{sex}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
